title: Michael Fallon – 2017 Comments on British Soldiers in Estonia
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michael Fallon, the then Secretary of State for Defence, on 30 October 2017.
content:
Nobody should be in any doubt of our unwavering commitment to the security of Europe through NATO in the face of Russian belligerence.
